meanings.definition: An outer garment covering the body from the waist to the ankles, with a separate part for each leg.
meanings.sent1: He wore his favorite trousers to the party.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new pair of trousers for work.
meanings.sent3: The trousers danced off the hanger and onto the floor.
meanings.sent4: Her trousers were like a shield against the cold wind.
meanings.sent5: The bright red trousers stood out in the crowd.
